summary: Completed testing of AETHON AI Strategic Intelligence Platform with Layer 8-10 components. All 21 backend tests passed (100%). All 4 new components render correctly: EmbodiedAI (robotics), SixGEdge (6G network), BlockchainMainnet (Ethereum), ChessBI (game theory). No console errors. Minor branding issues found - some 'NEXUS' text remains that should be 'AETHON'.

Frontend: SixGEdge component renders with world map, edge nodes, latency indicators

Frontend: No console errors on any component load
